testcase.name: Verify checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed And User has logged into the application....................................passed Given User find the product "1" and click the add to cart button............passed When User has navigated to the Cart page....................................passed And User clicks on the checkout button......................................passed Then The fields for inputting first name, last name, and Zip or Postal Code are displayed and have not been filled in.passed

testcase.name: Check for checkout information is filled with valid data (no empty field)
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed And User has logged into the application....................................passed Given User find the product "2" and click the add to cart button............passed And User has navigated to the checkout information page.....................passed When User enters First Name, Last Name, and Zip or Postal Code..............passed And User clicks on the continue button......................................passed Then A list of products to be checked out is displayed......................passed And Payment information, shipping information, and the total price are displayed.passed And There is a cancel button................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify navigation shipping information into checkout complete
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed And User has logged into the application....................................passed Given User find the product "3" and click the add to cart button............passed And User has navigated to the shipping information page.....................passed When User clicks on finish button...........................................passed Then Displays Thank you for your order! message with checklist and circle logo on the top of it.passed
